It's allowed because it's an infinitely stacking effect plus a burst spell.

Nashor has 120 Armor, so to deal 1400 damage in one hit, it needs to be 3080 pre-armor damage.

Kalista's Rend deals 60 (+60% AD), plus 32 (+30% AD) more per extra stack. At level 14, Kalista has 93 base AD, so Rend on its own deals 115.8 (+59.9 per extra stack) damage. To deal 1400 damage with that, she needs to land 50 attacks on Baron (which, at her innate AS of 0.920, takes about 55 seconds). If we assume she had 100 more AD and, say, +50% bonus AS, it would take 32 attacks and about 26 seconds.

Basically, it's not hard to set up *if Kalista can get about 20-30 seconds to fight Baron.*

My opinion on the subject? Make Rend deal half damage to monsters. Since it's infinitely stacking flat damage, it doesn't make sense to just give it a hard cap.
